name: Just one more...
description:
How long can you procrastinate? 

Test your skill in this game! Don't let your boss, Mr. Winter, give you more work. Keep him away and watch cat videos instead. Chat with Summer and let her help you with your workload or watch more cat videos. The choice is yours.

Programmer: Jolanda Riissanen 

Game designers: Jessica Lillbåsk & Jolanda Riissanen

Graphics: Jessica Lillbåsk 

Sound effects: Jessica Lillbåsk 

Voice: Shoji "StratoScopes"
